bibl.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.
bibl.title: New poems, consisting of satyrs, elegies, and odes together with a choice collection of the newest court songs set to musick by the best masters of the age / all written by Mr. D'Urfey.
bibl.publisher: Printed for J. Bullord ... and A. Roper ...

projectDesc.p: This e-text is part of the Works section of the Eighteenth-Century Poetry Archive (ECPA).
XML created for the Eighteenth-Century Poetry Archive (ECPA).

editorialDecl.p: Typography, spelling, capitalization, and punctuation have been cautiously modernized. The source of the text is given and all significant editorial interventions have been recorded in textual notes. This text has been edited to conform to the recommendations found in Level 5 of the Best Practices for TEI in Libraries version 4.0.0.
